column1: #text=A finger is a limb of the human body and a type of digit , an organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates . [ 1][2 ] Normally humans have five digits , the bones of which are termed phalanges , [ 2 ] on each hand ( exceptions are polydactyly , oligodactyly and digit loss ) . The first digit is the thumb , followed by index finger , middle finger , ring finger , and little finger or pinky . According to different definitions , the thumb can be called a finger , or not
